data.title: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko Well

featuredImage.alt: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko on the well built by Africa Relief

gallery.alt: Mariame Diawara alongside Fatoumata Tiemoko at the inauguration of their namesake well in Africa Relief project
Children gathering around the newly accessible water source, the Diawara-Tiemoko Well, in an African village
Local villagers drawing water from the Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko Well, provided by Africa Relief
The newly constructed Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko Well, a vital water source for an African community
Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko smiling beside the well that serves their community, thanks to Africa Relief

content.heading: Sun and water are the essence of life. Illuminate lives with your support.
content.description: In regions affected by water scarcity, every drop counts. These solar water wells, dedicated in honor of Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko, ensure that hundreds have access to clean, safe water. Beyond hydration, these wells represent hope, health, and a tribute to beloved individuals.
